Title: Early Home Care of Second Trimester Medical Abortion Is Safe
Teaser: In the home care group, 71% of the participants later spent fewer than 9 hours in hospital vs 46% of the hospital group.

Title: Boosting Thiazide Dosage Can Reduce Kidney Stone Risk
Teaser: Increased thiazide doses were associated with a greater decrease in urine calcium and kidney stone events over a 4-year period in adults who had kidney stones.

Title: Infertility Prevalence After Testicular Cancer
Teaser: A meta-analysis of 30 studies found low prevalence of infertility, at 14%.

Title: Can Prenatal Fish Oil Reduce AD Risk in Children?
Teaser: The mother's COX1 genotype could influence whether prenatal fish oil supplementation affects the risk for atopic dermatitis in children, a study found.

Title: UK's Hereditary Cardiac Amyloidosis Rates Higher Than Expected
Teaser: The researchers urged increased clinical vigilance for hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis in patients with symptoms or unexplained heart muscle thickening.

Title: Does Gram Stain Enhance UTI Diagnosis in the ED?
Teaser: Compared with other methods, urine Gram stain moderately predicted gram-negative bacteria but added little value to UTI diagnosis in the ED, raising questions about its clinical utility.

Title: How Can Primary Care Teams Collaborate More Effectively?
Teaser: View from the ground, by Dr Honor Merriman
